en.title: Skill Set
en.description: Exploring the diverse range of skills I've acquired and developed:

en.title: Full Stack
en.description: Proficient in multiple languages and frameworks for both front and back-end development; familiarity with multiple databases (MySQL, MariaDB, DynamoDB, NoSQL, PostgreSQL) and virtualisation technologies.

en.title: System Design and Architecture
en.description: Extensive knowledge of architectural patterns, database designs and cloud platforms (GCP & AWS). Expertise in microservices architecture, distributed systems, and API design.

en.title: Leadership
en.description: Experience leading and mentoring engineering teams; experience in technical planning; ability to foster collaboration and guide projects to successful completion.

en.title: CI/CD

en.title: Communication
en.description: Proficiency in technical writing and documentation. Ability to present complex ideas effectively to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.

en.title: Project Management & Delivery
en.description: Proven track record of delivering projects on time and within scope. Skills in estimating timelines, managing risk, and handling dependencies. Familiarity with Jira and SCRUM / Kanban.

en.title: Performance Optimisation
en.description: Expertise in optimising system performance, including load balancing, caching strategies, and latency reduction. Ability to diagnose bottlenecks and implement efficient algorithms.

en.title: Security Best Practices
en.description: Strong understanding of cybersecurity principles, secure coding practices, and data protection regulations (e.g., GDPR, CCPA). Experience with implementing authentication and authorization protocols such as OAuth, JWT, and SAML. Hands-on experience in monitoring and resolving CVEs.

en.title: Test Automation and Quality Assurance
en.description: Proficiency in designing and implementing automated testing frameworks (e.g., PHPUnit, Codeception, Cypress, Jest). TDD user and familiar with BDD.

en.title: Scalability and Reliability
en.description: Hands-on experience designing systems that scale horizontally and ensuring high availability. Knowledge of monitoring and observability tools (e.g., Prometheus, Grafana, New Relic) to maintain system uptime.

en.title: Codebase Modernisation
en.description: Expertise in upgrading legacy PHP codebases to modern standards, including transitioning from old/no framework to modern frameworks (e.g., Laravel, Symfony), improving adherence to PSR standards and PHP upgrades.

en.title: Database Optimisation
en.description: Advanced skills in optimising SQL queries and database schema design to improve performance and scalability in high-traffic PHP applications.
